DOC.brief_summary: An open-label extension study CONCERT ( DIM18 ) protocol evaluate safety dimebon ( latrepirdine ) subject With Mild-to-Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease Donepezil .
DOC.criteria: Successful completion 12 month DIM18 CONCERT study Mildtomoderate Alzheimer 's disease Probable AD , Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental DisordersIVText Revised ( DSMIVTR ) MiniMental State Exam ( MMSE ) score 12 24 , inclusive Stable donepezil least 6 month Other cause dementia Major structural brain disease Unstable medical condition significant hepatic renal disease
